"Get the Fodoran with the corrupted nucl:
"Good afternoon, Professor.
I would like to request your help for
this round of hands-on training.
I would like to see the Fodoran with corrupted nucleus,
Not just in the report but the in flesh...
If not too much trouble, Professor,
won't you come along together with me?
※Travel with Lottie only and defeat
Lv.60 or higher Fodoran that has corrupted nucleus.
Recommended quest： Cauldron Probe"
"侵食核付きのフォードランを……"

"先輩、こんにちは。
今回の実地研修もよろしくお願いします。
情報だけじゃない生での姿……
侵食核の付いたフォードランを
見てみたいんです。
先輩さえご迷惑じゃなければ
一緒にきてもらえませんか？
※ロッティのみ同行、Lv.60以上の
侵食核付きフォードランを撃破
推奨クエスト：火山洞窟探索"
